name: MXNetworkTransferMetric
desc: An object representing metrics about network transfers.

items.name: var cumulativeCellularDownload: Measurement<UnitInformationStorage>
items.desc: The total amount of data downloaded over the cellular connection.

items.name: var cumulativeCellularUpload: Measurement<UnitInformationStorage>
items.desc: The total amount of data uploaded over the cellular connection.

items.name: var cumulativeWifiDownload: Measurement<UnitInformationStorage>
items.desc: The total amount of data downloaded over the WiFi connection.

items.name: var cumulativeWifiUpload: Measurement<UnitInformationStorage>
items.desc: The total amount of data uploaded over the WiFi connection.
